title: My Club is still gone!
body: So my club called "Champions of Runeterra" is still nowhere, I try to recreate it and it says its take? Will I ever get my club back? please help

replies.body:
You still exist in this club, this is just an issue we'll have to solve together. If you reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with your club name and tag, we'll resolve this with you.

I hope this helps!
